name: (Paper 4) Cambridge Key English Test (KET6) - Writing Course
intro: (Level B1) Enhance your writing skills for the Cambridge KET6 exam by practicing structured and concise responses. This course focuses on crafting clear, well-organized notes, messages, and emails within a time limit. You will refine essential writing techniques such as answering specific prompts, maintaining logical flow, and achieving effective communication.
lessonNames: Write a note to Sam including what time to come, what to bring, and how to get to your house. Use 25 to 35 words.
